meta.name: Sync Open House Leads from SignSnapHome to HubSpot with Automated Email Follow-up

parameters.content:
## ðŸ“‹ SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

**Welcome to SignSnap Home â†’ HubSpot Integration!**

### Quick Setup:
1. Configure HubSpot OAuth2 credentials in n8n
2. Configure SMTP credentials for email (optional)
3. Update the "from" email address in Send Email node
4. Activate this workflow
5. Copy the webhook URL
6. Go to **SignSnapHome.com** â†’ Settings â†’ Integerations
7. Paste webhook URL and enable "Send on each submission"

âœ… Done! Open house leads will auto-sync to HubSpot!

## ðŸŽ¯ WEBHOOK RECEIVES DATA

**This webhook receives POST data from SignSnap Home**

URL Format:
`https://your-n8n.com/webhook/signsnap-hubspot`

Add this exact URL to your SignSnapHome.com automation settings and turn on auto-send.

âš¡ Triggers on every open house sign-in!

## âš™ï¸ DATA PROCESSING

**Extracts & enriches all data:**

âœ… Contact info (name, email, phone)
âœ… Property & visit details
âœ… Custom form fields (automatic!)
âœ… Lead score calculation (0-100)
âœ… Lead status (HOT/WARM/COLD)

**Lead Scoring:**
- Base: 50 points
- No agent: +30
- Rating 4-5: +20
- Rating 1-2: -20
- No buyer agreement: +10

## âœ‰ï¸ EMAIL REQUIRED

**HubSpot requires email to create/update contacts**

If no email:
â†’ Lead logged to error output
â†’ Manual follow-up needed

ðŸ’¡ **TIP:** Make email required in SignSnap form for 100% sync rate

## ðŸŽ¯ HUBSPOT

If contact exists (by email):
â†’ Updates information
â†’ Adds new visit to timeline
â†’ Updates lead score

If contact is new:
â†’ Creates new contact
â†’ Sets all properties
â†’ Marks as 'Lead'

âœ¨ Prevents duplicates!

parameters.html:

Thank you for visiting {{ $('Parse SignSnap Data').item.json.propertyAddress }} today.

We specialize in this area and can provide exclusive listings and personalized service. We're here to make finding your dream home easy and stress-free.\n\n" : "" }}If you have any questions about this property or would like to schedule another viewing, please don't hesitate to reply to this email.

Your Real Estate Team
parameters.subject: =Thank You for Visiting {{ $('Parse SignSnap Data').item.json.propertyAddress }}!

parameters.content:
## ðŸ“§ AUTO-FOLLOW UP

**Sends personalized thank you email**

Different messages:
- **No Agent:** Offers consultation
- **Has Agent:** Friendly follow-up

ðŸ”§ **Setup:**
1. Configure SMTP credentials
2. Update FROM email address
3. Customize footer

## âš ï¸ NO EMAIL HANDLING

**Guest didn't provide email**

Options:
â†’ Connect to Google Sheets
â†’ Send alert to team
â†’ Manual follow-up via phone

ðŸ’¡ Make email required in SignSnap to prevent this!

## ðŸ“Š CUSTOM HUBSPOT PROPERTIES (OPTIONAL)

**Create these in HubSpot for enhanced tracking:**

Go to: **Settings â†’ Properties â†’ Create Property**

**Recommended Custom Properties:**

1. `last_open_house_property` (Text)
   - Label: Last Open House Property

2. `last_open_house_date` (Date)
   - Label: Last Open House Visit

3. `has_real_estate_agent` (Dropdown)
   - Options: Yes, No, Not specified

4. `property_interest_rating` (Number)
   - Label: Property Rating (1-5)

5. `lead_score` (Number)
   - Label: Lead Score

6. `lead_status` (Dropdown)
   - Options: HOT, WARM, COLD, OPEN

**OR** just use standard fields + notes!
The workflow works either way.

## ðŸ’¡ PRO TIPS & ENHANCEMENTS

**Optimization Ideas:**

**1. Auto-Assign to Agent**
- Match property to agent territory
- Auto-assign contact owner in HubSpot

**2. Create Deals Automatically**
- Create deal for HOT leads (score â‰¥70)
- Link to property and contact
- Set deal stage based on score

**3. Add to Lists**
- Create HubSpot list per property
- Auto-segment by lead status
- Use for targeted campaigns

**4. Trigger HubSpot Workflows**
- Send automated nurture sequence
- Schedule follow-up tasks
- Assign to sales rep

**5. Add Photo Attachment**
- Upload guest photo to HubSpot Files
- Attach to contact record
- Requires additional node

**6. SMS Follow-up**
- Add Twilio node for instant SMS
- Parallel to email
- Higher engagement rate

## ðŸ”§ TROUBLESHOOTING

**Common Issues:**

ðŸ”´ **"Invalid email"**
â†’ Check email format in SignSnap
â†’ Ensure validation is enabled

ðŸ”´ **"Property doesn't exist"**
â†’ Create custom property in HubSpot
â†’ Or remove from node config

ðŸ”´ **"Authentication failed"**
â†’ Reconnect HubSpot OAuth2
â†’ Check token expiration

ðŸ”´ **"Contact not in HubSpot"**
â†’ Check execution history
â†’ Verify email was provided
â†’ Search "All contacts" view

ðŸ”´ **"Duplicate contacts"**
â†’ HubSpot auto-matches by email
â†’ Check for typos in emails

ðŸ”´ **"Email not sending"**
â†’ Verify SMTP credentials
â†’ Check FROM email is valid
â†’ Test SMTP connection

**Need help?**
â†’ n8n community forum
â†’ HubSpot API docs
â†’ SignSnap support
